content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (41, -82)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (41, -82) with a fuel inventory of {'coal': 50}, a drop position at (40.5, -83.5), and a wooden chest at position (40.5, -83.5) with an inventory of {'coal': 800}. 
The coal mine also has a neighbouring wooden chest at position (41.5, -83.5) with an inventory of {'coal': 435}.

### Coal Transport System
Consists of a burner inserter at position (39.5, -81.5) with a fuel inventory of {'coal': 12}, a pickup position at (39.5, -82.5), and a drop position at (39.5, -80.5). 
The inserter is connected to the coal mine at position (41, -82).

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0, 0) with a fuel inventory of {'coal': 50} and a status of EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory of the entity is not full before attempting to insert items.
- Check the warnings of the entity for any messages indicating a full inventory.

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity has items to extract before attempting to extract.
- Check the warnings of the entity for any messages indicating an inability to extract items.

### Errors when using burner mining drill with a full fuel source
- Ensure the fuel source of the burner mining drill is not full before attempting to mine.
- Check the warnings of the entity for any messages indicating a full fuel source.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables:
* `wood`: integer, current amount of wood in the inventory
* `coal`: integer, current amount of coal in the inventory
* `stone`: integer, current amount of stone in the inventory
* `iron-plate`: integer, current amount of iron plates in the inventory
* `drill`: entity, the burner mining drill at position (41, -82)
* `coal_chest`: entity, the wooden chest at position (40.5, -83.5) with an inventory of {'coal': 800}
